name: modify_workout
description: Modifies a planned workout from the training plan. Takes an event ID and new workout description, generates updated ZWO file, and re-uploads to intervals.icu.

event_id.description: The intervals.icu event ID of the workout to modify

workout_description.description: New workout description with intervals, intensity, and purpose (e.g., 'Change to recovery ride @ 50-60% FTP for 45 minutes')
